name: python_simple_syntax_error
bug_description: Function has missing colon after function definition causing SyntaxError
expected_behavior: All tests should pass after adding missing colon

name: python_undefined_variable
bug_description: NameError: variable is referenced before assignment in helper function
expected_behavior: Variable should be defined before use

name: python_type_error_string_int
bug_description: TypeError when concatenating string with integer in format function
expected_behavior: Should properly convert integer to string before concatenation

name: javascript_null_reference
bug_description: Cannot read property of null in user profile component
expected_behavior: Add null check before accessing property

name: python_index_out_of_bounds
bug_description: IndexError: list index out of range when processing empty arrays
expected_behavior: Check array length before accessing elements

name: python_division_by_zero
bug_description: ZeroDivisionError in statistics calculation when dataset is empty
expected_behavior: Handle empty dataset case before division

name: python_missing_import
bug_description: ModuleNotFoundError: missing import statement for datetime module
expected_behavior: Add missing import statement at top of file

name: python_wrong_indentation
bug_description: IndentationError in conditional block causing unexpected behavior
expected_behavior: Fix indentation to match expected block structure

name: python_incorrect_comparison
bug_description: Using assignment (=) instead of comparison (==) in if statement
expected_behavior: Change assignment to comparison operator

name: python_off_by_one_error
bug_description: Loop iterates one time too many causing IndexError
expected_behavior: Adjust range to prevent accessing beyond array bounds

name: python_infinite_loop
bug_description: Loop condition never becomes false causing hang
expected_behavior: Fix loop condition or add proper exit condition

name: python_race_condition
bug_description: Concurrent access to shared resource without proper locking
expected_behavior: Add threading lock to protect shared resource

name: python_incorrect_exception_handling
bug_description: Catching wrong exception type causing errors to be missed
expected_behavior: Catch correct exception type or use broader exception

name: python_memory_leak
bug_description: Circular reference preventing garbage collection
expected_behavior: Break circular reference or use weak references

name: python_incorrect_default_mutable
bug_description: Using mutable default argument causing unexpected state sharing
expected_behavior: Use None as default and initialize inside function

name: python_incorrect_regex
bug_description: Regular expression not matching expected patterns
expected_behavior: Fix regex pattern to correctly match input format

name: python_api_integration_error
bug_description: API endpoint not handling error responses correctly
expected_behavior: Add proper error handling for non-200 responses

name: python_datetime_timezone_bug
bug_description: Naive datetime comparison causing incorrect ordering
expected_behavior: Use timezone-aware datetime objects

name: python_incorrect_string_encoding
bug_description: UnicodeDecodeError when reading file with non-ASCII characters
expected_behavior: Specify correct encoding when opening file

name: python_incorrect_json_serialization
bug_description: TypeError when serializing datetime objects to JSON
expected_behavior: Implement custom JSON encoder for datetime

name: python_sql_injection_vulnerability
bug_description: String concatenation in SQL query allowing injection
expected_behavior: Use parameterized queries instead of string concatenation

name: python_incorrect_async_await
bug_description: Missing await keyword causing coroutine not to execute
expected_behavior: Add await keyword before async function call

name: python_file_not_closed
bug_description: File handle not closed causing resource leak
expected_behavior: Use context manager (with statement) for file operations

name: python_incorrect_decorator_usage
bug_description: Decorator not preserving function metadata
expected_behavior: Use functools.wraps to preserve function metadata

name: python_global_state_bug
bug_description: Tests failing due to shared global state between test runs
expected_behavior: Reset global state in setup/teardown or avoid global state
